g.title: task_b7d9096f-75c7-414a-8aca-25700957d94f

g.title: task_74534859-32f2-4d32-a441-27d5180bef43
g.text: [task] konstruktoid.hardening : redhat family aide package installation

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_adfe03c8-807c-4721-87c5-82a404eda82f
g.text: 162 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))not aidecron.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_a257a2bb-1901-499d-82e0-3e0929bf17f9
g.text: 163 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))not aidecron.stat.exists]

g.title: task_926a050e-5190-4e83-a35a-10ac001b6e07

g.title: task_4fb2b477-b6b5-49ad-9f08-e1e06ab5905f

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_680decd0-3101-4204-9b72-3e536de2bff9
g.text: 168 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_343bbe37-2205-4b33-bc12-7515c175b3ae
g.text: 170 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedbnew.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_5f910120-69e3-494e-8808-113d98106b95
g.text: 171 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "Debian" and not ubuaidedb.stat.exists]
